column5: Vintage Solar Powered Smart Home central to EVERYTHING! 3 Bedrooms, 2.5 baths. Walking distance to restaurants, local cafes, hip antique shops, 7-10 min drive to Downtown, Riverwalk, 13 min to the Pearl & 14 min to the airport. Chris Madrid's, restaurant and bar, an easy 10 min walk. 18 min from Lackland / 14 min from Fort Sam Houston. Comforts not found in any other AIRBNB rental. Super clean creative space and right of the 10 freeway.
column8: Vintage Smart Home, near Downtown-Solar Powered
